item.title: Officer acquitted in death of Ta’Kiya Young, a pregnant Black mother accused of shoplifting
item.description: An Ohio officer has been acquitted of all charges after fatally shooting Ta’Kiya Young in a supermarket parking lot.

item.title: Watch Live: Trump and Mamdani speak after first meeting at the White House
item.description: President Trump and incoming New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani are speaking in the Oval Office after their first meeting. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Mamdani set to meet with President Trump at White House today
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is set to meet with President Trump on Friday afternoon, where he plans to discuss affordability​.

item.title: A Chicago street vendor couple has a defiant response to immigration arrests: Stick to the routine
Here's what experts say is behind bitcoin's $800 billion drop
item.description: Bitcoin has erased all of its 2025 gains and is on track for its worst monthly performance since 2022. Here's what experts say about the decline.

item.title: Cruise ship death: Teen died by asphyxiation resulting from a bar hold, source says
item.description: The 18-year-old cheerleader from Titusville, Florida, was reported dead while aboard the Carnival Horizon cruise ship on Nov. 8.
